attributes.action: Legislation to prosecute individuals for gross neglect for victims of CSE gangs
attributes.additional_details: Individuals should be prosecuted for gross negligence and failure of duty of care to protect children
attributes.background: With reference to failure to act on CSE and grooming gangs. Rather than being listened to children were arrested for drunk and disorderly. This has resulted in gang rape and even murder in some cases. There has been failure in duty to care and gross negligence e.g Telford and Rochdale

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like it to be an offence not to report child abuse, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/217158
